name: Pumpkin Farm
description:
A small farm game created for Halloween.

Become the pumpkin loving witch and realize your dream of your very own pumpkin farm. Try to grow every type of pumpkin!

This is an early prototype of the game. It includes simple farming mechanics.

Future features:

-more pumpkins

-carving pumpkins

-displaying pumpkins in a collection

-pixel-art UI

-sound and music

and so much more that's currently missing from this bare-bones prototype.
